modName: Valendor - A Home in a Waterwheel
summary: Valendor is small, rustic playerhome within a waterwheel built into a screen pond at the base of a waterfall. The house itself is located on the cliff border between Eastmarch and The Rift and directly East of the Nordic tower of Nilheim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center] [img]https://38.media.tumblr.com/18e49e2757eacee3812cecbddcd53559/tumblr_nhqothZGJ21tip7w0o1_1280.png[/img]
[center][/center]
[size=3]
[/size][center][size=3]Valendor is a rustic style home within waterwheel perfect for those who want a secluded home away from the bustling cities of Skyrim or simply a hideaway for the lone traveler.[/size]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61413-1-1420524224.jpg[/img][/center][size=3][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61413-2-1420524224.jpg[/img][u][b]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61413-5-1420524224.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61413-3-1420524224.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61413-3-1420524518.jpg[/img]

Requirements
[/b][/u][/size][list][*][size=2]Skyrim is up to date[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Dragonborn[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Dawngaurd[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][size=2]Hearthfire[/size][/size]
[/*][/list][size=3][u][b]

Location
[/b][/u]The house itself is located on the cliff border between Eastmarch and The Rift and just down the path from the Nordic tower of Nilheim and east of Ivarstead. 

[size=1]Very sorry for the confusion! I completely neglected to mention this originally.[/size]
 

[u][b]Recommended Mods[/b][/u]
[/size][size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11370]Spouses Can Live Everywhere[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks [/url][/size]
[size=3]
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][u][b]Compatibility[/b][/u]
[/size][size=3]I don't know of any conflicts in terms of location. If this conflicts with any of your mods or any mods you know of, or any problems at all, please leave it in the comments and I will try to address it. Thanks!!
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][b][u]Instalation
[/u][/b][/size][size=3]

To instal: Simply download by either Nexus Mod Manager, quick and sweet or, as I tend to, manually download it. Don't forget to backup your saves just to be safe![/size][size=3]
[/size][list][*]1) Download manually from the 'Downloads' tab above[/*]
[*]2) Extract files into the Skyrim Data folder[/*]
[*]3) Launch Skyrim
[/*][*]4) Enjoy!![/*]
[/list][size=3]

To uninstal:[/size]
[size=3]No fancy scripts or gameplay changes here! Simply delete the Valendor.bsa and .esp [b]or[/b] deselect the file in your Data Files tab in your Skyrim launcher. Be sure to get all of your valuable items out before you delete the file or they'll be lost forever[/size]!!



[size=3][u][b]Credits and Thanks[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*]All of the resources i used can be found [url=http://geekdominthenorth.net/blog/list-of-modders-resources/]Here[/url] in Elienora's list of Modders Resources[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61413-1-1420524349.jpg[/img]
[/list]
author: Honorary Alfanzo
